text: Strong craving right now. Friday night.
Help me ride this out. Don't lecture me.
What happens if I play the tape forward?
I know I'll regret it tomorrow. But right now...
Give me something to do for the next 10 minutes.
The shame from my drinking days haunts me.
Two choices: call my sponsor or do more grounding?
Craving is passing a bit now.
If I relapse, what do I do?
Save: urge surfing + play tape forward + distraction got me through.
